M

main(String[]) - Static method in class app.DocumentClassifierApp
 
Model - Class in utils
Model class is used to simplify loading and saving of trained classifier;
Model(String) - Constructor for class utils.Model
Creates model with given name.
MODEL_CLASSIFICATION_CLASSES_FILE_TAG - Static variable in class utils.ModelOperator
Tag in model file followed by the name of file containing the list of available classification classes.
MODEL_CLASSIFIER_TAG - Static variable in class utils.ModelOperator
Tag in model file followed by the name of used classifier.
MODEL_DOCUMENT_TAG - Static variable in class utils.ModelOperator
Tag in model file followed by information about training document.
MODEL_FEATURE_ALGORITHM_TAG - Static variable in class utils.ModelOperator
Tag in model file followed by the name of used feature algorithm.
MODEL_FILE_EXTENSION - Static variable in class utils.ModelOperator
The extension of file where Model is saved.
MODEL_TRAINING_SET_TAG - Static variable in class utils.ModelOperator
Tag in model file followed by information about training documents nad their features.
ModelOperator - Class in utils
File operator class is an abstract class with attributes containing information about tags in file containing saved model.
ModelOperator() - Constructor for class utils.ModelOperator
